content: the carefree market bag crochet pattern is wonderful to work with it s basic stitches and easy options for colour changes this crochet market bag is worked from the bottom up and all as one piece which is similar to the other market bags that have been in this crochet along the carefree market bag features rounds of half_double_crochet stitches worked in the third loop in order to add texture it also features double_crochet v stitches that add a little bit of open work there are no complicated stitches in this bag which means it is a green bag to try if you are newer to crochet a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com/carefree-market-bag-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 18 x 20 row of single_crochet = 4 inches finished size approximately 15 x 17 inches excluding the handles yarn 24/7 cotton by lion brand® 186 yds/170 m 100g/3 5 oz 100% cotton 4 worsted weight you will need 2 balls purple colour a 1 ball aqua colour b 1 ball ecru colour c hook size g/6 4 mm hook notions yarn needle
